DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose 6-month , parallel , single-blind randomize control trial ( RCT ) feasibility study self-management program reduce sedentary time increase physical activity ( Sit Less Move More ) woman age 55-70 year . The primary aim determine feasibility acceptability intervention ; secondary aim test effect intervention primary health outcome , physical activity ( mean daily step count accelerometry ) 6 month . The investigator also conduct economic evaluation process evaluation guide future large study inform scaled-up implementation plan .
DOC.brief_title: Everyday Activity Supports You ( EASY ) Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy communitydwelling woman age 5570 year ( via selfreport ) currently engage ( previous 3 month ) strength training , < 30 minute brisk walk moderate exercise/week able climb stair walk 400 meter ( e.g. , mobility disability ) . Participants receive treatment medical condition preclude participation walking program
